# Episode 14: Suzy and the Cloud Family

From Suzy's perspective.

----------------

<b>

I ran while crying!

I jumped and ran while crying, and started punching everything in sight!!

<b>

"Uhi~~~~~n! What the heck is with this number?! Pueh! There are four digits... huh?! Tii!! Run... buh! They're circling around... nuriya! No way!! Upah! Damn itーーーー!! Nuhn! Fish!! Tou! I'm so hungry~~~~~!! Upii! What the heck... chei! There's so many... get away! Toa! Whose... pukya! fault... kunu! is it!? Owata! It's me... gupupot! It's me! Uraa! It's me!! Ueeeee~~~~~n!!"

<b>

<b>

The number is roughly several hundred!

I can't do area attacks with my skills.

They're not all in a straight line, and the forest is full of obstacles.

I have no choice but to take them down one by one.

At first, I was using dual swords to smash them down, but...

<b>

Huh? Wouldn't it be better to use my hands and feet together?

And while I'm at it, wouldn't it be more efficient to smash rocks and shoot finger bullets?

<b>

Thinking that, I started punching and kicking while flying around with bare hands.

<b>

As a result, I charged in recklessly, crashing into bushes, branches, rocky surfaces, and the ground, getting splattered with blood, and it turned out to be quite a terrible state.

"My village girl’s everyday clothes" are in tatters! Sniff sniff...

<b>

<b>

After about an hour, I managed to exterminate the mobs over a wide area with a radius of 10 kilometers.

<b>

"How about that, you bastard! It's mostly cleaned up, right?! ...Damn it~~, I've come to a place less than a kilometer from the human settlement. That was close... oh, there are still some left ahead. Ue! There are people too! Yikes!!"

<b>

<b>

In a panic, I flew towards the remaining mobs, and found a cleared area in the forest.

There, a two-headed snake was facing off against an old man.

<b>

"Whoa! First villager sighted! But this is no time for that! There's another snake, and about ten wolves... a pack! They're trying to surround the old man, huh? Not on my watch!"

<b>

<b>

I immediately moved in and started punching the wolves one after another, crushing them with finger bullets.

<b>

"These guys think they're hiding their presence, but they're completely visible! Oh! The old man is amazing! He sliced that snake in no time!! Ah! Damn it! One got away! Shit!!"

<b>

After defeating one snake, the old man also slashed down a wolf that jumped in, but...

<b>

"Wow, that old man is something else... ah, but his movements... is it poison?! This is bad! Damn it, hurry up!!"

<b>

Right now, I was looking down from a tree at the area where the old man and the snake were.

The old man and the snake were almost in the center of the area.

I was looking at them from the side.

For now, I broke off a nearby branch and threw it between the old man and the snake with a "tei!"

<b>

"Whoa, a clean cut, that's amazing... nuh, the last little doggy is aiming for the old man from the opposite side of the area... I need to get rid of the poison too, this is bad... I have no choice!"

<b>

Honestly, I wanted to avoid contact with the locals as much as possible, and if I were to enter a human settlement, I wanted to be more cautious... but right now, this is not the time for such thoughts!

I hurriedly jumped down from the tree, approached the old man, said a word, and then lifted him up.

<b>

Alright, let's evacuate him to the opposite side from the wolves... huh? Why is he looking surprised? Did I say something weird?

Well, whatever, for now, I need to let him rest in the shade!

<b>

I laid the old man down in the shade and immediately returned to the sword that was left in the center.

<b>

Alright, you little dog, you've changed your target to me.

After all, defeating them in front of the old man using bare hands or my own weapons would probably stand out too much!

<b>

With this weapon, I should be able to slice the snake too, right?

From the looks of it, it seems to be a mid-tier zero rank?

Even with a weapon of this level, if I wrap it in "ki," I can do that much.

<b>

The old man was definitely infusing "ki" into his strikes!

Huh? ...Does that mean the people here can use "ki" too?

<b>

While I was thinking about that while holding the sword, a wolf suddenly leaped at me.

I sliced it cleanly in half!

<b>

As soon as I returned to the old man... yikes! The poison is progressing quite a bit!

I need to hurry! But what should I do? Using a high-level healing skill would be overkill, and it would probably be flashy...

<b>

Should I try combining the initial detoxification magic with "ki"? ...That way it would be discreet and not stand out, right?

First, I'll get rid of the poison! I'll think about treatment after that, depending on the state of the wounds!!

<b>

Kneeling beside the old man, I placed my palm on the wound on his leg and began to chant the detoxification magic while channeling "ki."

<b>

Oh! This feels good! I can feel my "ki" enveloping the old man... huh? The wounds are healing too!

It seems that the recovery element of the detoxification magic is linked to the activation of the cells... is that it?

It sounds a bit far-fetched! Wahahaha!

<b>

Oh, the old man seems to be happy too♪

...Huh? What? Not an ordinary person? Huh? Slicing and detoxifying? Not normal?

No wayーーー!?

<b>

<b>

Even so, I can clearly understand what he's saying.

The words the old man is using are the same as those I heard from the armor above. It's a language I don't know, but I can understand what he's saying.

It's a strange feeling. I can hear it, but it feels like I'm searching for words while speaking? Am I pronouncing it correctly?

<b>

Ah, Howard Cloud... is it? Nice to meet you! I'm Suzy.

Huh? Auroral? I don't understand.

<b>

Y-yes? Where did I come from? Ah, um... over that way, I guess...

Uhi~~~~n! Don't get so excited! It's not good for your blood pressure!

Parents? I don't have any parents~~! I'm all alone, sorry~~~~~!!!

<b>

<b>

Kuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu...

<b>

<b>

!! Hagu... what a gluttonous stomach I have! And why now of all times!?

Ahh... ahhh! Don't look at me with those eyes!

It's too embarrassing!! I'm so sorry!!

<b>

<b>

Huh? W-what did you just say?

Food? Cooking? Plenty?

What a violently attractive word! My life just got cut in half!!

<b>

Whaaat?! S-salt, you say?! Harb... to?

Guhah! Is this the end?! Are you here to finish me off?!

Uwaaaaa! My mouth is flooding!!

<b>

Is it alright? Can I visit your home? Won't it be a bother? Am I not intruding? Is it not your family's lunch?

If someone suddenly says something so kind in a place I don't know, I might just start crying!!

<b>

Normally, it would be unthinkable for a girl (who looks like this) to go to a man's house on a first meeting...

But I can't help it! I have no confidence in resisting such temptation!!

<b>

Please! It's alright, right? I won't let go! Take me to eat! Fly me to the food!!

<b>

<b>

◇

<b>

When I got to Cloud's carriage outside the forest, I was surprised!

<b>

I thought it would be a horse since I heard it was a carriage... but it wasn't a horse.

Cloud said this is a "horse," but...

The silhouette is indeed a "horse."

<b>

But it has scales, right? And hooves? Or claws? No, hooves? They look like claw-like hooves! I know that hooves originally evolved from claws...

<b>

And the face, it has no ears, right? Its teeth are sharp... this face looks like a lizard, right?

But the mane and tail are horse-like... it's a mysterious creature!

<b>

Well, I guess this is what "horses" are in this world.

This really is an unfamiliar world...

<b>

Listening to Cloud's story, it seems this place is a country called Auroral, in a village called Amukam.

<b>

If you go south about 20 kilometers from here, there's a town called Coop Town, and he said it would take about an hour to get there with this carriage, so it must be able to go at a speed similar to a mama-chari?

<b>

If you go further south about 300 kilometers from there, you can reach a city called Dekember, one of the twelve cities.

Furthermore, if you go about 1200 kilometers south from there, there's the "Royal Capital"!

<b>

The Royal Capital!! Where the king is! This is fantasy!

But from here, it's a one-way distance of 1500 kilometers.

Even a super-powered man who can run at 100 kilometers per hour would take 15 hours.

It's not a distance you can casually travel...

<b>

<b>

While on the carriage, I was repeatedly asked how I got here, but I could only answer that I was in the forest before I knew it.

<b>

In reality, that's the truth!

<b>

This Amukam Forest, also known as the Iroshio Great Forest (or so I've been told), is said to be home to many magical beasts, and it's not a place for a girl like me to be alone.

<b>

...It seems that Cloud has been treating me like a child ever since we met...

I think this body is an adult... Is there a discrepancy in perception from my perspective as a Japanese person?

<b>

By the way, the magical beasts refer to the mobs from my perspective.

Here, they seem to be called magical beasts.

And the snakes and wolves I saw earlier are originally creatures that only exist deeper in the mid-levels or higher, and their appearance near a village like this is said to be an abnormal situation.

<b>

A cold sweat ran down my back.

I said it sounds tough, but I hope my face didn't look too strained?

It was quite a sweat!

<b>

Also, those snakes were quite shallow in their location... I wanted to say that, but I couldn't bring myself to.

<b>

<b>

As we talked, the carriage continued on, and I was able to enjoy the scenery of the village along the way.

<b>

I've never lived in the countryside, and I've only glimpsed such pastoral scenery from a train window, so experiencing it like this for the first time was a bit moving.

<b>

The surface of the Hodisun Pond (that's what it's called) was reflecting the sun's light while mirroring the thickets, sparkling beautifully.

<b>

The long line of poplar trees along the road, combined with the blue sky, made it feel like a calendar photo?!

<b>

The undulating fields of wheat stretching to the horizon made me sigh without realizing it.

<b>

Cloud was watching me with an amused look as I took in the scenery.

Stop it! Don't look at me like I'm some little animal!!

It's making me feel embarrassed!

<b>

By the way, I was told that the harvest will begin all at once next week, so it seems this is the only time to see this scenery.

Did I come at a good time?

<b>

<b>

<b>

As we were talking, we arrived at the Cloud residence.

<b>

It was situated on a slightly hilly area, surrounded by windbreak forests.

It was an L-shaped building with white walls.

Long from east to west, it jutted out one step south from the east side.

<b>

The roof has a two-tiered angle that changes partway.

What do you call this kind of roof?

<b>

The recessed part of the L has an awning, making it a terrace.

This side is the south side.

<b>

There was a splendid door on the gable side of the west wing on the first floor.

This must be the entrance.

<b>

In front of that entrance stood a woman.

I think she's Cloud's wife.

She looks to be in her 50s, with shimmering grayish-green eyes and beautifully styled chestnut-brown hair gathered lightly on top of her head.

<b>

She looks like a kind and elegant lady.

<b>

When Cloud stopped the carriage and helped me down, he took my hand.

Whoa! Cloud is such a gentleman!!

I feel like a lady!

Wahaha! I got a bit carried away and tried to act refined!

<b>

When the wife asked, "Who are you?" I thought I'd greet her like a lady.

<b>

But since I didn't know a Western-style greeting like lifting my skirt, I followed Japanese business manners...

I straightened my posture, placed my hands in front of my body, looked into her eyes, introduced myself, and bowed politely.

<b>

How was that? I think my posture was beautiful!

<b>

The wife kindly returned my introduction.

<b>

"Nice to meet you, I'm Sonia Cloud, Howard's wife. Nice to meet you, Suzy-chan. You're such a cute girl."

<b>

She gave me a super soft smileーーーーーー! I felt so incredibly happy!

<b>

Huh? Wait? A cute girl? Am I being treated like a child?

<b>

Speaking of which! I hadn't realized until now because I had no one to compare myself to, but... am I short?

I can tell that Cloud is really tall, but... my line of sight is at Sonia's chest level, isn't it?

There's more than a 10-centimeter height difference, right?

<b>

As I was thinking about that while smiling like a lady, Sonia came rushing over with a worried look when Cloud mentioned "the savior of my life."

<b>

Ah, I'm fine already!

...Just as I was about to deepen my smile, it suddenly hit me!

<b>

Gurugyururururururururururururur...

<b>

Guhah!! (Coughs up blood)

<b>

C-could this (stomach) betray its master not once, but twice?!

<b>

Indeed, since entering this property, a wonderful aroma has been wafting through the air! I had been holding back as my mouth felt like it was about to flood!

<b>

What is this timing, just like before and now!?

What is this huge noise!?

<b>

I was trying so hard to behave properly as a lady... and now it's all ruined!!

<b>

Moreover! To make that noise in front of the real lady, Sonia, I felt like my skin was stripped off in an instant!!!

What is this humiliation play!? I can't lift my face up! Uhi~~~~~n!!!

<b>

<b>

As I trembled with shame, I noticed someone next to me bursting out laughing!!!

<b>

Uwaaaa... I can't believe it! I can't believe it, Cloud!

You knew I was hungry, didn't you!?

And yet, you laugh like that!!!

...Ah, I feel like crying.

I'm going to cry, okay? I'm going to cry!!

<b>

<b>

As I was trembling, Sonia came over and wiped my face.

...Ah, my beautiful apron is getting dirty...

Did she wipe it before I started crying?

<b>

Sonia is really such a kind person!

<b>

In the end, I was allowed to take a bath.

A bath!

I've been bathing since I got here, but this is my first time in a proper bath! I'm getting a bit excited.

<b>

When we arrived at the bathroom, a woman named Elrose was preparing the bathtub.

<b>

Compared to the slim Sonia, Elrose was a woman with a solid build.

Not that she was fat, but she had a certain "strong mother" vibe.

Is she a bit taller than Sonia?

<b>

Her black hair mixed with gray was neatly tied up in a bun on top of her head.

Is she older than Sonia? She's not in her 60s, right?

<b>

After handing me over to Elrose, Sonia said she would go get some clothes and left the bathroom.

<b>

<b>

Elrose placed her hands on her hips, gave me a quick once-over from top to bottom, then huffed and said, "Raise your arms," so I raised both arms...

<b>
